description: This file provides utility functions for managing feature flags within a React project environment, sourcing feature flags from the REACT_APP_FEATURE_FLAGS environment variable, which can be provided as JSON or CSV, and includes a function to check if a feature is enabled.

methods.name: getFeatureFlags()
methods.description: Retrieves feature flags from the REACT_APP_FEATURE_FLAGS environment variable, parsing it as JSON or CSV, and returns an object with flag names as keys and booleans as values.

methods.name: isEnabled(flagName, fallback = false)
methods.description: Checks if a specific feature flag is enabled, returning its boolean value or a fallback default if the flag is not set.
